Author: MoKenyanCrypto
Title: ANN: RealtyCoin Pre ICO sale: Cryptocurrency based on Real Estate Assets
Body: What is RealtyCoin? Website: http://therealtycoin.io/ RealityCoin is a product of a new company called Inversiones Derezunsky SPA located in Santiago of Chile. We have made this coin with a purpose of buying real estates at low prices and then selling them at an higher price for profits. This implies that we will be spreading a 10% profit in every deal with our investors where our investors can have a payment option that is accepted by the builders of the company and real estate agents. [/center] Types of Real Estate properties we are looking for Our business is based on buying these kind of properties especially targeting properties from bankrupt people and businesses. We are much interested in these kind of properties Ruined properties Abandoned properties Forced to sell to banks Properties in legal problems People who need to sell their real estates now   How it works  YOUTUBE VIDEO[/glow]https://youtu.be/rURgONkXVhE]YOUTUBE VIDEOhttps://youtu.be/rURgONkXVhE [/color] RTC token info With RealityCoin you will be investing in one of the most solid and stable assets in terms of real estate. Once you invest with us, you will be our partner in the property business because we buy the real estate at very low prices and the sell them to customers at higher prices. We share the part of the property with our investors who  guarantee a better price for our coin. The main idea here is to buy and sell in different countries from the world. Why you should use RealtyCoin RealtyCoin is a cryptocurrency that gives a lot of benefits. First of all, we are a good interdisciplinary team with knowledge of different areas such as law, finances, computer design, and marketing, among others.  In the traditional business, when you invest in real estates, you can find many problems like investing a minimum amount, having credit cards, a very good rating in the banks, etc. Realty Coin can solve all these problems that have mentioned before because you would invest any amount of money without any need of credit card, or you are banking, and also investing from any country around the world etc. There are no limits over this open world for us. To be located in Chile, itâ€™s a very good strategic place because Chile is considered to be a very transparent country for the free of corruption, if you want to verify please check out our website https://www.transparency.org RealtyCoin will be a decentralized currency based on blockchain technology and Ethereum smart contracts because the coin marks a new era in the real estate market. Our currency will be revolutionized the real estate world in terms of breaking the restrictions and borders that an individual must invest in the properties. There is no doubt that the real estate is the most convenient asset in the world and a solid investment. RealtyCoin aims to raise the global real estate market that is estimated at more than 200 trillion dollars. The owners of our currency can invest in highly desirable assets in Chile and subsequently the project can grow in the rest of the world. The RealtyCoin is a decentralized cryptocurrency based on the blockchain technology and Ethereum smart contract. The RealtyCoin will mark a new Era in the realestate market, both in Chile and all over the world. This is because the coin will break restrictions and borders in investing in properties. The RealtyCoin aims to tap into the global real estate market which is valued at more than $200 trillion. By buying the Coin you will be investing into trhe highly valued assets in Chile.  OUR TEAM [/color][/u] http://therealtycoin.io/team/ [/b] Pre-Sale:  Start date: November 17,2017  End date: December 17,2017  Total token emission 75.000.000  Bonus: minimum amount 0.25 ETH=705 RTC for 20% bonus: 0.5ETH=1410 RTC for  40% Bonus  Price: 1 RTC = 0.00036 ETH 0.5ETH=1410 RTC 0.25ETH=705 RTC  Minimum purchase amount Pre-Sale: 0.25 ETH [/left]  [/center]  ICO Sale  ICO start date: 17 December 2017  ICO end date: 31 January 2018  Target volume of tokensale: 500.000.000  ICO price: 1 RTC = 0.00036 ETH  Soft Cap: $500,000 Usd  Minimum purchase amount: no restrictions  Maximum purchase amount: no restrictions   Token distribution: [/b]  200M TO BE AVALAIBLE TO TOKENSALE.  75M ARE RESERVED FOR ICO BONUSES  150M RETAINED BY REALTYCOIN TEAM  75M RESERVED FOR EARLY ADOPTERS IN PRESALE.    ICO bonus program:  First Stage: Buy More than 0.5 ETH 25% Bonus/Less than 0.5 ETH 20% Bonus  Second Stage: Buy More than 0.5 ETH 15% Bonus/Less than 0.5 ETH 10% Bonus  Third Stage: Buy More than 0.5 ETH 10% Bonus/Less than 0.5 ETH 5% Bonus  Each Stage have 15 days ICO funds distribution  Accepted payment: ETH, BTC,PayPal Whitepaperhttps://drive.google.com/open?id=1DRdU4f8Fa6nfeIID2FyzgwNFB9eJmLwo FaceBook:https://www.facebook.com/therealtycoin/ Twitter:https://twitter.com/realtycoin1 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/realty-coin-099b72152/ Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/GJv9eBKxZpJokYA_7zXI9A[/url PARTICIPATE NOW AND GET 25% FREE TOKENS [/b][/glow][/color][/font]
